title: How do I answer calls using the Bluetooth headset?
answer:
Once your TalkBand B2 is connected to your phone using Bluetooth, it will vibrate when you have an incoming call and display the phone number or name of the caller on the screen.

● When the Bluetooth headset is attached to the strap, press the two side buttons on the strap to release. Your TalkBand B2 will automatically answer the call.

● When the Bluetooth headset is not attached to the strap, press the side button to answer a call.
